snippet: A new randomized placebo-controlled study by French researchers indicates that ginkgo biloba extract does not work as a preventive for Alzheimer's disease.
abstract: A new randomized placebo-controlled study by French researchers indicates that ginkgo biloba extract does not work as a preventive for Alzheimer's disease.

headline.main: Doubts on Ginkgo Biloba as a Memory Aid
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Regimens: Doubts on Ginkgo Biloba as a Memory Aid
